name: REPULSE: Galactic Rivals
description: REPULSE: Galactic Rivals is a local competitive couchgame up to 4 players set in a retrofuturistic universe. Players have the ability to attract and repulse cubes spread around the arena at high speed. A dozen of game modes revolve around this core mechanic.
minimum_requirements: OS: DOS 1.00 Processor: Intel 8086 16-bit Memory: 0,064 MB RAM Graphics: 2D EGA Storage: 593 MB available space
